component.name: SSH Studio
component.summary: Edit and validate your SSH config with a simple GTK 4 desktop app.

description.p: SSH Studio is a native GTK 4 desktop app for managing your ~/.ssh/config. It provides a friendly interface to create, edit, and validate SSH hosts without diving into terminal editors.

li.p: Visual host editor – Fill in common fields like Host, HostName, User, Port, and IdentityFile with ease.
Inline validation – Duplicate aliases, invalid ports, and syntax errors are caught instantly.
Search and filter – Quickly locate hosts by alias, hostname, user, or identity.
Raw & Diff view – Edit the raw ssh_config text with live diff highlighting.
Quick actions – Copy a SSH command, test a connection, or revert changes in one click.
SSH key management – Import, generate, and manage your keys directly in the app.
Safe saves – Configurable automatic backups and atomic writes to protect your configuration.
Designed for GNOME – Smooth GTK 4 interface with dark style preference, keyboard and mouse friendly.
